name: Shape Palette
description:
Shape Palette is a 2D puzzle game that offers simple gameplay that requires immense strategy. Place various shapes in order to complete levels whilst also considering how they can combine in order to make room for more shapes.



Features


  • Focus On Puzzle Solving With Minimal & Simple Visuals
  • Play Over 45 Different Hand Crafted Levels
  • Deep Game Mechanics Including Combining, Splashing & Various Shape Types
  • Steam Achievements
  • Play Entirely With A Mouse!
  • Difficulty Ramping & Tutorials To Get You Eased Into The Game
